statement.p: In 90.48 of the last 21 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{21}}={0.9048}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{21}. \displaystyle{P}={0.9048}\cdot{21}={19.0008}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 21-19.0008=1.9992 We round that as requested to 2.
